The Hull

Planing vs. displacement hull

Planing

Pushing water down with its flat and round nose and lifting the front your board. (More Stable)

Hard vs. Inflatable

Hard board tails release the water via the tail much better.

Hardboard have edges with more grip. So for surfing the two almost cannot be compared.

Inflatable Boards are more affected by wind and current.
